_doc: Per-category default action when no PolicyRule matches an event. SECURITY: high-risk categories MUST default to 'block'. Only explicitly low-risk categories may default to 'allow'.

ai_tool.reason: No rule matched AI tool call; default-deny for AI actions

shell.reason: No rule matched shell execution; default-deny for shell

file.reason: No rule matched file operation; default-deny for file access

network.reason: No rule matched network activity; default-deny for network

db.reason: No rule matched database operation; default-deny for DB access

auth.reason: No rule matched auth event; default-deny for authentication changes

config.reason: No rule matched config change; default-alert for configuration

system.reason: No rule matched system event; default-audit for OS events

logging.reason: No rule matched logging event; default-allow for logging

metric.reason: No rule matched metric event; default-allow for metrics
